subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With Luol Deng sidelined in Game 1 on Monday, Chicago’s Jimmy Butler had 21 points and 14 rebounds while holding the Miami Heat’s LeBron James to 24 points over all.
snippet: With Luol Deng sidelined in Game 1 on Monday, Chicago’s Jimmy Butler had 21 points and 14 rebounds while holding the Miami Heat’s LeBron James to 24 points over all.
